success.successfull-creation-formatted-info: You have successfully created an account. Click on the <2>ADDRESSES</2> tab to add/manage shipping addresses. You can also view orders and make changes to your account information.</3>
success.successfull-creation-more-info: Manage your account, addresses, and order here. You can view/save items in your <2>LIST</2>when logged into your account.</3>

legal.canadian-cookies: We use first-party and third-party cookies for analytical purposes and to show you advertising related to your preferences, based on your browsing habits and profile. For more information, please consult our <1>Privacy Policy</1>. By closing this banner or continuing to browse otherwise, you accept the use of cookies.</2>
